DataAccess

Class ProductAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataAccess.ProductAccess

  • public class ProductAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class provides access to Products which are stored in the database
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vlad

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProductAccess()
      This constructor connects the java application to the Database needed for the project.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Product p, int quant, int whID)
      This method adds a product in the Product table and based on it's index it stores the quantity of the Product in the specified warehouse
      void delete(Product p)
      This method deletes an object of type Product from the Product table based on it's ID
      java.util.ArrayList<Product> getProd()
      This method acceses the Products stored in the Product table and it returns them in an ArrayList of Products.
      Product getProd(int prodID)
      This method takes as argument an integer which represents the product ID from the Product table and it returns an object of type Product
      Product getProdID(java.lang.String name)
      This method takes as argument a String name which represents the name of the product from the Product table and it returns an object of type Product
      void update(Product p)
      This method updates the price of the desired product which is given as an argument

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        This constructor connects the java application to the Database needed for the project.

    • Method Detail

      • getProd

        public java.util.ArrayList<Product> getProd()
        This method acceses the Products stored in the Product table and it returns them in an ArrayList of Products.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Products

      • getProd

        public Product getProd(int prodID)
        This method takes as argument an integer which represents the product ID from the Product table and it returns an object of type Product
        Parameters:
        prodID - Is the ID of the product which is to be returned
        Returns:
        An object of type Product

      • getProdID

        public Product getProdID(java.lang.String name)
        This method takes as argument a String name which represents the name of the product from the Product table and it returns an object of type Product
        Parameters:
        name - Is the name of the Product which is to be returned
        Returns:
        An object of type Product

      • add

        public void add(Product p,
                int quant,
                int whID)
        This method adds a product in the Product table and based on it's index it stores the quantity of the Product in the specified warehouse
        Parameters:
        p - Is an object of type Product
        quant - Is an integer which represents the quantity of the product
        whID - Is an integer which represents the warehouseID where the product is stored

      • update

        public void update(Product p)
        This method updates the price of the desired product which is given as an argument
        Parameters:
        p - Is an object of type Product

        public void delete(Product p)
        This method deletes an object of type Product from the Product table based on it's ID
        Parameters:
        p - Is an object of type Product
